name: PHASENormalizationMode
desc: Options that determine whether the framework adjusts a sound asset's loudness for the user's output device.

items.name: case dynamic
items.desc: A mode that instructs the framework to adjust a sound’s volume according to the user’s output device.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A mode that instructs the framework not to adjust a sound's volume according to the user's output device.
